text: I know as an actor there is a certain liberation auditioning for a role that has no beauty requirements.
author: Mireille Enos

text: You can muck around with different guitars for certain bits, but you have to have your own sound. That's your benchmark, that's your sound. I also play a Black Beauty. It sounds amazing.
author: Dan Hawkins

text: I have to hit the gym. I have beauty appointments. I have to work toward my next job and maintaining my image, just like an athlete.
author: Linda Evangelista

text: The beauty of 'The Walking Dead' and the beauty of being on a television show for a while, is that, it's your backstory, it's part of what you are, it's what you carry with you every day.
author: Laurie Holden

text: We need a balanced, long term energy policy to reduce our dependence on foreign oil and preserve the beauty of the land we love.
author: Heather Wilson
